## Checklist

### For New/Updated Notes

- [ ] Note follows file naming conventions (`q-*` or `c-*`)
- [ ] YAML frontmatter is complete and valid
- [ ] Both EN and RU translations present
- [ ] All wikilinks resolve correctly
- [ ] MOC and related links added
- [ ] Tags are in English only
- [ ] Status is set to `draft`
- [ ] No emoji used in content

### For All Changes

- [ ] I have validated my notes locally using `vault validate`
- [ ] I have reviewed the automated validation results
- [ ] I have checked for broken links
- [ ] I have tested my changes in Obsidian
